## cisco-webex-bot web

Start a API Web-Server

### Synopsis

Start a API Web-Server

```
cisco-webex-bot web [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help          help for web
  -i, --ip string     IP to listen on (default "localhost")
  -p, --port string   The Port to listen on (default "8080")
```
